review_body: Is App has totally lost it's luster! I used it three years ago to buy a house. Back that it worked wonderfully. Now unfortunately I get houses that I do not want even though I specified that I do not want them such as HOA'S. Get quite understand what happened to this app obviously they are not keepi...Full ReviewIs App has totally lost it's luster! I used it three years ago to buy a house. Back that it worked wonderfully. Now unfortunately I get houses that I do not want even though I specified that I do not want them such as HOA'S. Get quite understand what happened to this app obviously they are not keeping up with it I do not recommend it anymore going to check out red fin.

Love this app! Love the map search feature!! I've been using the app the last week and it has been great, until today. Now anytime it's loading the map it crashes. I've uninstalled amd reinstalled multiple times, restarted my phone and it still wont work in map mode. Seems like it could be my mobile...Full ReviewLove this app! Love the map search feature!! I've been using the app the last week and it has been great, until today. Now anytime it's loading the map it crashes. I've uninstalled amd reinstalled multiple times, restarted my phone and it still wont work in map mode. Seems like it could be my mobile device but other apps are working just fine. I'm at a loss, i hope it will work in the future, there's no better app for sale and rental properties than Zillow!!

Having the exact same problem with the exact same phone (Pixel 3) as Aaron Lin. I try to open the app, everything seems to load but the map and then it crashes. And on a side note the app bugged me about a lot of different properties I was mildly interested in, but managed to let a deal of a lifetim...Full ReviewHaving the exact same problem with the exact same phone (Pixel 3) as Aaron Lin. I try to open the app, everything seems to load but the map and then it crashes. And on a side note the app bugged me about a lot of different properties I was mildly interested in, but managed to let a deal of a lifetime that I had faved slip through un-notified and we lost our chance :c I can only assume some grey-washing flippers are planning to ruin the poor thing.

Loved this app but it's crashing after April 2020 update. I'm actively looking for a home and this app was extremely helpful until the last update. Now it crashes 3 seconds after opening. I've started to use thevRealtor app, but the listing prices are higher for the exact same homes i had in my favo...Full ReviewLoved this app but it's crashing after April 2020 update. I'm actively looking for a home and this app was extremely helpful until the last update. Now it crashes 3 seconds after opening. I've started to use thevRealtor app, but the listing prices are higher for the exact same homes i had in my favorites on Zillow. Don't know which listing price is real.

It needs to add a feature to "trash" houses you don't like so your not going over the SAME houses all the time while trying to find recently added houses. Also a feature to exclude some neighborhoods for example I would like to search Fairfield county without having to look at Bridgeport or other un...Full ReviewIt needs to add a feature to "trash" houses you don't like so your not going over the SAME houses all the time while trying to find recently added houses. Also a feature to exclude some neighborhoods for example I would like to search Fairfield county without having to look at Bridgeport or other unfavorable areas. It really takes up too much time trying to get thru the cities you don't like.

Zillow is a great app and a great place to begin the daunting task of home/apartment hunting. They have so many listings and the app and website is easy to navigate and understand. The only thing I wish they had were reviews of apartment complexes so I could see how others feel about the complexes a...Full ReviewZillow is a great app and a great place to begin the daunting task of home/apartment hunting. They have so many listings and the app and website is easy to navigate and understand. The only thing I wish they had were reviews of apartment complexes so I could see how others feel about the complexes and the management of said complexes.

it is help and let's me see different houses in the market w/o having to drive too far. However, some listings are not quite up to date. Also, there is no way to filter "pre-foreclosure" and "foreclosed" properties. They show up as available properties, without prices due to being owned by the bank.

It has some good features, like the details and price history, which is very useful. But it's not up to date and you can't filter out foreclosures. Also houses for rent when lessed revert to an old prior sold price instead of indicating they were leased.

I love this app except for the fact that every single day I get a notice about a new listing in my area and it's a house that has been on here for many months now. The person trying to rent the room keeps changing the add everyday so that everyone gets a notice. I am considering deleting this app ju...Full ReviewI love this app except for the fact that every single day I get a notice about a new listing in my area and it's a house that has been on here for many months now. The person trying to rent the room keeps changing the add everyday so that everyone gets a notice. I am considering deleting this app just because of that one person. If I could block them from showing up on my end I would.

There are houses listed on Zillow that can only be found if you search for them by address. Good is a more trustworthy site than this app. My real estate agent presented with over 10 house which have been on the market for several weeks but didn't appear when a search for the town the house were lis...Full ReviewThere are houses listed on Zillow that can only be found if you search for them by address. Good is a more trustworthy site than this app. My real estate agent presented with over 10 house which have been on the market for several weeks but didn't appear when a search for the town the house were listed. But as soon as I entered the address, like magic the house appeared with all of the information.
I initially loved this app, but after the update yesterday, it will not load at all. I've tried uninstalling and reinstalling. No fix. Hope it gets fixed soon. I'll rate it better.

Great way to check real estate values. It's been helpful as I have helped some younger friends plan to buy a home. I do have one friend however who sold his house for more than twice the zedtimate. So be aware that values given are estimates!

I used to be able to view the whole country map, with houses. After clicking on a zillow email about a particular zip code, that zip is all I can view, no matter how many reboots, restarts I do (it's not in the search, filters or anywhere else). Maybe if I uninstall, and reinstall.

author_name: marshab 1 of 3 VCA, school board meeting
review_body: Love seeing properties as soon as they are listed. Don't have to wait for an agent. Can eliminate those that won't work for us. But would like it if we did not get repeated notifications for those properties not on the market any longer, for sometimes years.

Utilize this app weekly, it runs smoothly, although sometimes search parameters can exclude relevant results. If I find a property on another app I will look it up for review on Zillow. Information that constitutes search results is only as good as the realtors who upload the listings.

I've used this application for my rental home two different times and the second time it's just not working while trying to access applications. Can't get ahold of anyone from Zillow on the phone and there appears to be no email responses coming back to me so I'm disappointed

I like it, but I really wish I could see my tags on the website as well, and an option to not show me a particular house would be awesome too. Really tired of notifications about a house I hate, but I can't exclude it from my saved search.

Wonderful app ! but I hate the geographical map !! if you want to push one red dot you may end up pushing a totally different one because they're so close together sometimes... That's annoying. The map isn't needed, it would be better off if they got rid of it..

Finding houses was like finding a needle in a hay sack. Zillow made it a ton lot easier to find not just the houses but land, ect. All the house information shows up in just one touch. Zillow is a very usful app when finding your Ideal home, I recommend this app to everyone.

Update 4/24: Crashes on open since 5PM 4/23. T-Mobile confirms Zillow has issues. Love the features and design. Great job! Moving from Colorado to North Carolina, we don't know which town, so one suggestion, please allow sorting of favorites by state and town so I can plan a trip. Exporting the list...Full ReviewUpdate 4/24: Crashes on open since 5PM 4/23. T-Mobile confirms Zillow has issues. Love the features and design. Great job! Moving from Colorado to North Carolina, we don't know which town, so one suggestion, please allow sorting of favorites by state and town so I can plan a trip. Exporting the list would also be excellent. Thanks!

Be careful posting properties in Zillow!! They claim to be transparent but log everything you post without giving you an option to change non public data. This results in an obscure POV of your property. I learned to cautious with posting on Zillow and will definitely share my story with my colleagu...Full ReviewBe careful posting properties in Zillow!! They claim to be transparent but log everything you post without giving you an option to change non public data. This results in an obscure POV of your property. I learned to cautious with posting on Zillow and will definitely share my story with my colleagues, friends and other home owners

Fantastic! I love that you can set what filters for exactly what you want and don't have to sift through all the houses to find the right ones. They also pick houses you may like based off your preferences. It's easy to get a short list of houses with the heart icon.

My favorite app of all time. I have spent more time on this searching houses of my dreams hoping someday when I decide to buy, this is where I'll come to find it. It's also helping cure my boredom of being quarantined during the covid19 pandemic. Couldn't ask for better app.

The navigation on this app is god awful. Absolutely terrible user experience. Search is clunky at best. Can't continue using this to look for my house. Get some UX specialists to overhaul the look and feel of this app. It needs help.

It was working well until it started crashing on my Google Pixel 3 phone (Android 10) on 4/23... I've tried to rebooting my phone and reinstalling the app, but nothing works... Does anyone know what's the issue and how to fix it? Thank you!
I love this app, its really helped me see what's available and how fast homes are selling, etc. I also LOVE seeing the older homes in our area, their charm and beautiful character🌞!! Thank you!!!

So far so good. 5 stars when you add a feature that allows to rate our saved homes from 1 to 10 (or 5) and allow sorting based on that. Also, allow us to input custom numbers for price, acreage, etc., rather than having presets in a drop down.

Easy to use and gives all necessary info, photos, etc. Have had a lot of fun and education searching properties and getting to know this areas housing market through the Zillow app. My favorite way to "wander" this city.

One of the things I find most frustrating with this app is having to see houses I lost interest in after the first time I viewed it but it still shows up on the app. There should be a way to "archive" homes I no longer want to see when I've done a search.
Please put a Hide button for listings! It's very silly and frustrating that you got rid of it. Ive wasted so much time clicking on the same places over and over, hoping they are new listings.

Not user-friendly. It has access to my location, but if I try to search near me, nothing happens. I can't clear old searches. I just want to page through my options. Why can't I do that? The only app worse is Truila.
Easy to use. Price is marked so I can choose something in my range and not waste my time or yours searching around. Easy to navigate map to search listings. Many ways to search listings.

This version does not run properly on my Moto G7 Power. It sits and spins never loading. On rare occasions it will load but only works for for few minutes then back to spinning. Not useful in this condition.

There need to be changes to this app. I am tired of seeing houses that that are rentals. Please let searchers not see those. Also we should be able to not see houses that does'nt have inside pictures and also houses that are fixer upers.
The new listings alert is pretty awful. I get "new listing" alerts many days in a row for the SAME house. This really needs to be fixed. If they can fox that bug, the rating would go up.

Would like more search parameters. Also, a plugin that can show drivetimes from the house being looked at, to a specific pin dropped for a reference of work travel. Google maps overlay for shopping in area of interest.
App is great, except I think it was a big mistake to take out the feature of not showing a house if you're not interested. If the feature was still there, it'd be a 5 star rating for sure.
Very easy to navigate through, gives you tons of options. Gives you the option to modify your needs/wants in a listing/unit. Overall lovely app for finding great rentals or properties.
This is a good tool for home searching remotely. The app functions work good now. Be careful because there are some Scammers who still manage to slip through the cracks! Consumers please be aware!
It works, has all the right filters and browsing is easy/quick for me to navigate through what's available. Looking forward anything done to improve ux and make things even faster/easier!
Love, love, love this app! It is easy to have multiple searches, alerts are useful, easy to find your Saved items. ~ Michelle, Stevens Point, WI

I was able to purchase my last two home by utilizing Zillow. The app is amazing. I can travel any where to look for homes and see what the going price is for Real Estate, without leaving my home! I recommend this app to everyone.

The whole app is super easy. You can filter through prices, amount of rooms, and so many more to find the perfect home. There's tons of extra bits and bobbles that make it an enjoyable and informative app
The map could use some improvement. It would be nice to have a feature that measures driving distances. Overall I like the format for the most part and it easy to navigate.

Constantly sending me notifications about houses that don't meet my search criteria. If I wanted a house in another area I would have selected that area. If i wanted a house with less than 1/2 acre I wouldn't have selected 1/2 acre.
I use to love this App, but recently it stopped updating. Now I get zero results REGARDLESS of the City I select or search criteria I use! What in the world happened???
Love the app, finds all the houses based on what I'm looking for. I wish I could hide the homes I'm not interested in though.

This app is very easy to use and makes house hunting easier. The only thing is that it is not always up to date and shows houses that have already been sold. Overall my experience using this app has been great and I recommend it.
Amazing app! For buying and renting. Schools for each house is great. Houses in a school district of the school you want your kids to go to, fantastic!

zillow is really declining lately. each month less and less homes are listed on here. but I know they are for sale. just have to do it the old school way. I also hate when you search for houses, you get a bunch of trailers too. I didn't click on Manufactured
App seems pretty good, but need an option to filter out houses you are not interested in. Also, seems like other websites list a lot of houses which don't show up here.

Useful app with nice search features. To make it more useful I recommend Zillow introduce a comparison feature allowing users to compare listings between two or more towns. Compare on price, taxes, schools, libraries, grocery stores Etc
I'll give this app a five star rating if they'd actually remove auction houses when you filter them out. I deselect auctions yet they all still show up. Please fix your app.
There is no search button - stupid! You're stuck after select filter choices. Very annoying please fix it in your app.
App crashes every time I try to scroll through pictures of a posted listing. Connected to Wi-Fi or with Max bars 4g doesn't make a difference. Running on LG Stylo 3.
Horribly app. Not the easiest to navigate and is extremely slow. Often doesn't show rental property even though all settings are correct.
Since the recent updates, this app shuts down after 2 seconds. Now it is unusable. Please fix, as we are looking to relocate soon.
I am unable to delete a search area i am no longer interested in. I keep seeing the same type of house over and over again. There is nothing unique about any of them.

Their could be a few better features like exclude foresclosure, pre forclosure and auction properties. Also being able to x out or exculde hoses your not interested in and have them not show up on your search would make the app above 5 stars.

If there is one thing i could change it's that annoyingly slow slider view when selecting a listing from the map. It is super slow and moves the entire map up along with it as it goes up, then moves back down on deselect, super slow again. It should snap like bam, bam. The annoying slider should als...Full ReviewIf there is one thing i could change it's that annoyingly slow slider view when selecting a listing from the map. It is super slow and moves the entire map up along with it as it goes up, then moves back down on deselect, super slow again. It should snap like bam, bam. The annoying slider should also disappear when i exit a listing and show only the map. Right now when i exit a listing by tapping the top left arrow button, I see the map again but half of it is being obstructed by the slider.

I gave it five stars because unlike online and other apps this one is up to date, I'm currently in a inpatient program and I'm closer to getting a place now thrn I've ever been and this app is helping with that a lot I just wish I had a bit more cash to be real
This app freezes and shuts down almost everytime I open it. It started after their last update on 4/10. Otherwise it would be a good app
The places on this app is current with the marketplace. Makes you happy to have found a home of good choice.
Best app for locating and viewing any property. The information on each listing helps me make up my mind if a physical tour is next. Great job
Pretty solid app, but could use improvement. It would be nice if I could sort by commute time for example. I really like the lot lines feature.
Great, but I wish you could mark ones you dont like so they disappear off your searches. That would be extremely helpful.
It is a great app, but could use a feature such as an ability to mark a house so that I know I've seen and not liked the house
I wish there was a filter to filter out homes that have a 3d view available. As well as, floor plans.
Zillow is wonderful! I think the provide good information and an easy way to search.
It used to be easy friendly, you could select exactly what style of home u are looking for. And location. Now it is ?? Homes I am not interested in! Fix it.
Have to create an account to really use it. Things get auto turned on. It's forcing me to only look at foreclosures now with no pics of the home. The online web page is way better! Useless app.

Our realtor said zillow is about a day or so behind in real time intonation. We were using the app to find houses and would be 1 day too late on the ones we liked. However, I do like the information about the schools

The best feature I was using during our house searching was being able to highlight an address on some other realtor website, tapping map and selecting the Zillow app and it loading right up. That feature was just removed, I have down graded to the last version this was available for the time being....Full ReviewThe best feature I was using during our house searching was being able to highlight an address on some other realtor website, tapping map and selecting the Zillow app and it loading right up. That feature was just removed, I have down graded to the last version this was available for the time being. Please consider reinstating this feature. Thank you.
It's not intuitive how to navigate. Sometimes prices are shown other times not at all. Kludgey is best to describe it.
Has been great! 😁 Until today, I've updated the app, restarted my phone. App still won't load...?😡 Lol... never mind I had reinstall... 😉
As soon as I open the app it crashes. Uninstall and reinstalled still just crashes. A great app up to this point though.
They really need to sort out their categories, so frustrating looking for HOUSES and the majority of things showing up being apartments and townhouses.
I wish there was a feature to dislike a property so then when it pops up on a recurring search, it is more efficient.
Terrible, website much better. App showing up no homes or 3 where website had 40+. What the heck. No way to search my zip code, and surrounding. Deleted.
Zillow is my go to app to search for homes! It's extremely user friendly and the large quality photos make choosing the perfect home effortless!
Awesome!!! It cuts to the chase and shows me everything for sale in the area I'm looking.
This app is horrible....why I'm not able to view multiple listings & not have to click on each dot on the map is crazy
Saw more listings without the app. App doesn't allow me to view a list, just the map. Much less efficient.
Very helpful... but there's not a lot of listings for what I'm personally interested in... but still worth the app.
This app used to work on my phone but recently I can't even use it. The screen goes black when I scroll into an appartments details and I can't read anything.
I would like to suggest a feature that allows you to remove the homes you already said no to so you don't have to keep seeing them. Also please allow for a sort by monthly payments.
I love this app. It gives you the crime rate for each residence that is listed. It is very easy to naviagate.

No option to delete account. You have to email them and they dont answer. I just want my account to be deleted and theyre an absolutely disgusting company for doing this. Im reporting your app on the play store every day until you delete my account or at least let me change the email so it isnt on m...Full ReviewNo option to delete account. You have to email them and they dont answer. I just want my account to be deleted and theyre an absolutely disgusting company for doing this. Im reporting your app on the play store every day until you delete my account or at least let me change the email so it isnt on my main account
Glitchy. I'm constantly checking for updates because the app doesnt work properly, but no updates.
The filters with this app never work with any update. Other than that it's a fun app to look at houses.
If I could give zero stars I would. Not having a way to get a list view is moronic. You waste time poking on dots instead of quickly scrolling like you can on the website. Deleted.
The app closes as soon as I open it. I've tried clearing my cache, deleting/reinstalling, restarting my phone, etc. with no luck.
Can't search for homes effectively. App redirects me to provide information for me listing a property. When I am actually searching for property.
App was running well with no problems. Now it keeps crashing everytime i try to open the app.
Always easy to get to. Usually keeps up with the current price. Zillow is one of my favorites
It is packed with features that are easy to use. Provides tons of information on every property. Love it!
App is total waste, looking for property and the locations are not eve6 the correct location. How hard is it to get a location correct.
A very enjoyable app that offers great pics that allows you see the properties as if you were there in person.
Doesnt work anymore. Cannot open or operate app. Constantly crashes. Even after updating or resetting/restarting
Always fun and easy to locate listings for sale or rent anywhere in the United states.
Good app. Haven't been able to find something yet. But nothing to do with the app. It is clear and concise.
It just stops getting any new home info after awhile ! It's frustrating. Otherwise, when it works right it is awesome !

For the love of all that is holy... fix the issue with the filters. I specifically deselected showing me auctions and I still end up with 4-5 houses that are listed as auction in each town I look in. This has been going on for ages. Also others recommended, there should be a feature to hide houses. ...Full ReviewFor the love of all that is holy... fix the issue with the filters. I specifically deselected showing me auctions and I still end up with 4-5 houses that are listed as auction in each town I look in. This has been going on for ages. Also others recommended, there should be a feature to hide houses. I see the same 30 houses that have been on the market for 1+years. If I wasnt interested then, I certainly am not now.
This tool is really priceless, whether your a serious buyer, or just like to dream and surf. It also creates a broader awareness of your possible future options.

I put down, I'm looking for 3 or 4 bedroom, 2 bath, garage, House! WATERFRONT! you show me houses in town! Not on waterfront, and manufactured homes, your doing better, but I'm looking for 3+ bedroom 2 bathroom, garage on waterfront

I wish I could submit photos of my call and text history since making the mistake of using the app feature to schedule a tour of a home for sale. I have been relentlessly harassed by Zillow agents since. From 8am to 8pm, non-stop calls and texts from Zillow agents trying to schedule a tour I already...Full ReviewI wish I could submit photos of my call and text history since making the mistake of using the app feature to schedule a tour of a home for sale. I have been relentlessly harassed by Zillow agents since. From 8am to 8pm, non-stop calls and texts from Zillow agents trying to schedule a tour I already attended by removing the Zillow middle man and calling the selling agent myself. Zillow has made me afraid of my phone. I have now blocked 4 numbers and counting.

App is tedious and not well thought out. There's no way of eliminating a home or property after you've looked at it, so it keeps turning up over and over and over again and again. Problem is when you're looking at so many homes/properties you don't recognize it until you wasted a minute or two looki...Full ReviewApp is tedious and not well thought out. There's no way of eliminating a home or property after you've looked at it, so it keeps turning up over and over and over again and again. Problem is when you're looking at so many homes/properties you don't recognize it until you wasted a minute or two looking at it until you get to the part that of the property that made you reject it earlier. Do this a few hundred times and you want to scream. That and the properties are never mapped correctly. Uggh!
Finding what you're searching for is easy. The map makes it very user friendly!
App wont work. Tried to uninstall and install again but will not continue to work. Please fix the problem.
Need to be able to filter out places without a price. Unselecting auctions does nothing.
I always enjoy this app, 3rd time downloading this app ,it makes finding the right home at the right price easier
Ignores filters. I keep getting notifications of houses that should have been filtered out. Its wasting my time.
Crashing, it's not working. I've uninstalled and installed a few times already. No luck
All of the sudden the app started crashing. Can see list, but cannot use map...

The map view that it makes you stay on is extremely annoying. The actual website is much better. There you can actually see the houses and you're not trying to click on little bubbles. There isnt even a low to high sorting option so when you do manage to scroll through the houses (if it doesn't rand...Full ReviewThe map view that it makes you stay on is extremely annoying. The actual website is much better. There you can actually see the houses and you're not trying to click on little bubbles. There isnt even a low to high sorting option so when you do manage to scroll through the houses (if it doesn't randomly close) then the homes bounce drastically in both price and location. I suggest using the actual website and not the app. It's far better
Good app, but just a bit difficult to find somethings like the map and neighborhood crime rates.
Crashing everytime at start. Even tried restarting the phone, but didn'twork. New update must have corona virus.

Do not update the app. The latest update takes away the option of having multiple filters shown on the map. Meaning you can no longer see "recently sold" as well as "for sale" together on the map. I'm not sure who's idea this was but it's not a good one. Having the ability to see what houses have re...Full ReviewDo not update the app. The latest update takes away the option of having multiple filters shown on the map. Meaning you can no longer see "recently sold" as well as "for sale" together on the map. I'm not sure who's idea this was but it's not a good one. Having the ability to see what houses have recently sold for as well as the current market was an easy way to check fair market value. This is no longer possible. I will be looking for an older version of the app or moving to something else.
Very easy to use app. No randomn ads. Type address/zip or city & you are good to go.
Very good format, helpful filters, easy to use, and helped boyfriend and I find a house
Not the fastest to load photos, but great search features and everything else.
Great way to find what your looking for!! Great at updating the properties!!!
The new update will not even allow the app to fully launch. I like using the app, but there is a bug in there somewhere.
Very easy to use, very happy with it. Many options on House's.

I am disappointed in the commute feature. I trusted it and now I know it is not accurate. One of our favorite houses was only 10 minutes from work based on the commute calculator on the app. But when I opened it to Google maps to check the route, google maps said it was over 30 minutes. The rest of ...Full ReviewI am disappointed in the commute feature. I trusted it and now I know it is not accurate. One of our favorite houses was only 10 minutes from work based on the commute calculator on the app. But when I opened it to Google maps to check the route, google maps said it was over 30 minutes. The rest of the app is great. I love the notes/tag feature. I would like to change that the lot size be listed at the top with br and ba and square feet. But the commute calculator needs some bugs worked out!
Gives incorrect search results. I am looking to rent a condo and all it gives me are apartment complexes mixed in the condos. Also will not show any subleases or "lease take overs"
Great app, keeps me informed of homes as soon as they're available for sale.
Great and easy to use but don't trust the tax estimates.
More details and search adjustments than ever! It is good they aren't competing in the house market
Only giving it a 1 star because the app keeps crashing. I can't even do anything on the app at all.
Stopped working on my android device all of a sudden. It opens, then quickly closes repeatedly.

In general, I really like how this app flows and its usability (casually, or for extended searchtime). I would really love to filter my saved homes by tag, though! (i.e. Then if I tag something as a top-tier favorite within the favorites, I can only look at those. I would really love to filter my saved homes by tag, though! (i.e. Then if I tag something as a top-tier favorite within the favorites, I can only look at those. I like the app. My main issue I have is it shows you houses that dont match your settings. As in I have put in for homes looking to rent that allows pets. But 90% of the homes they send me as new dont allow pets. I uninstalled the app because I found it a waste of my time. Hopifully they will fix this soon. It's a good app.

Flooded with notifications. In notification settings, the only options selected are "Saved Searches" and "Saved Homes". However, it CONSTANTLY sends notifications about homes that DO NOT MATCH saved searches, making notifications useless. Using a Moto X4. This app works well and provide good housing information. I love Zillow!

author_name: I know I'm an asshole, but
review_body: Quit trying to make this better. You're not. Options used to be located all on one menu, not its on four? Why make it less convenient? And now I can only look at For Sale/For Rent/Recently Sold one at a time? Everytime I click one, it shuts the others off. I need to see all three sometimes and its a...Full ReviewQuit trying to make this better. You're not. Options used to be located all on one menu, not its on four? Why make it less convenient? And now I can only look at For Sale/For Rent/Recently Sold one at a time? Everytime I click one, it shuts the others off. I need to see all three sometimes and its a pain to switch back and forth. But don't reach out to a realtor or an apartment complex through the app. For reference, I'm house hunting and I unfortunately work the 3rd shift and am only available to contact on my off days. First, they have a Zillow guy text you a dozen times, they al...Full ReviewLook the app is useful for FINDING a place. But don't reach out to a realtor or an apartment complex through the app. For reference, I'm house hunting and I unfortunately work the 3rd shift and am only available to contact on my off days. First, they have a Zillow guy text you a dozen times, they also call you. Then the Zillow guy will connect you to a different realtors if you've asked questions about different houses on the app. Expect tons of calls/texts.

App is pretty good but NEVER NEVER contact a broker through the app, neither email or phone. These people are leeches and won't stop trying to contact & bother you. If you find a place in the app find the real broker outside of Zillow, and contact them directly.
With Zillow I founded my dream home without an agent Or going outside very useful app recommendation to the world

I use this app everyday! It's seamless, almost never crashes, (I am NO technical genius, not even close to it! If Zillow is "Lindsey Friendly", it's EVERYONE FRIENDLY!) It's seamless, almost never crashes, (I am NO technical genius, not even close to it! If Zillow is "Lindsey Friendly", it's EVERYONE FRIENDLY!) It only takes minutes, (no joke) to not only learn to utilize this application fluently, but MASTER its user-friendly dashboard/platform. This app ends the need to utilize multiple MLS sites or resources to find properties that are not only in your target area, but throughout the entire country! This is a one-stop-shop for sure! NO COMPLAINTS! I have been using Zillow for YEARS. Starting off as a Licensed Real Estate Agent, transitioning to Contractor/Investor/REO & distressed property "flipper" & eventually landing into the world of interior design, historical restoration and renovation, custom painting and property customization, I cannot say enough good things about this app! The property value and CMA information is reliable and accurate. It's an absolute go-to when it comes to keeping my clients budgets in check and their personal final financial investments below their area and their homes individual market value. This allows me to confidently educate & ensure my clients that after all renovations & customizations are final, they will still have equity in their home. This allows us all to stay within the lines of what areas allow what type of extras, and the best part is if we decide as a client business team they're wants exceed the value of their neighborhood, Zillow allows us to list their home as a FSBO, and find a Target area where their taste and there wants and preferences allow for the value of their homes individual Market :-) 2 thumbs up and five stars! Zillow is a real estate lovers Bible! Whether you're a professional, or just passionate about property, Zillow gives everyone an easy, thorough education in real property, without overwhelming and confusing the majority of buyers, sellers, &/or lookers.

Honestly, the worst of the major real estate apps. Sure, it's popular, but the search features don't stack up to apps like Realtor or Trulia. It's crazy how a search using the exact same parameters on Realtor may turn up 100 listings - while on here you might get 5. The information provided about ho...Full ReviewHonestly, the worst of the major real estate apps. Sure, it's popular, but the search features don't stack up to apps like Realtor or Trulia. It's crazy how a search using the exact same parameters on Realtor may turn up 100 listings - while on here you might get 5. The information provided about homes on this site is minimal - whereas others give you every detail about the property (heating, cooling, roof type, flooring, foundation). I know all these real estate sites pull their info from the same MLS but it's how much information they provide from the MLS that is the big difference & as far as I can tell, Zillow provides the least of all. Using this site would be like reading the newspaper but only getting the first 10 words of an article. You are better off using a site that spends more time & effort on it's function than on advertising. Uninstalling because frankly when one of the dozens of "notifications" I get from Zillow tells me an address to check out - I go to Realtor or Truvia to look at it because there will be more detailed information.

When I type in the address I want to see that home and only home.

You can set multiple options to filter property but it always just shows empty land. Furthermore, zillow will then email you 3 times a day with recommended homes, but they are all empty land as well. Looking for a 3 bed/2 bath, well forget that here are 100 1/10th acre lots for $300,000.

I love how you are pracrically in the house! I can dream of the exact style I want and find it in my city. I also like the fact that Zillow lists the schools near the houses. Great for research purposes and overall satisfaction!

why would you take away the hide feature? it allows you to tailor your search for what you want and get rid of the houses you've already looked at instead of clicking over and over again highly frustrating.

i like the app and it is intuitive but i hate the notification it send every minute. My phone will be constantly buzzing all day long, also draining my battery. Fix the notification system to be less annoying!

This site always lets me know when there are price reductions on my favorite homes. The reason I didn't give a five star is because the area I desire, zillow doesn't list alot of home with my specifications like other sites. Overall, Zillow is a great site to find your next home.

wish i never updated from old app. This is clunky, and no longer displays lot lines or street view. Seems they dont want us to have this information as a way to get us to contact a realtor. Im dumping this and finding another way to look for my next home.

there must have been a recent update because i use to be able to know what was new and what has been recently changed right away without scrolling thru alot of properties looking for an orange label. i reset to new and they are not new! go back to the way it was please
A very helpful. Zillow does all the work. I like that they are not intrusive like other home finding apps. It shows you the property and you decide if you want to contact the realtor or not.

app was working great until a recent update happened and now the homes flr sale in my area never update. all my content i see is from last week with no change. i went from seeing hundreds of homes for sale vs 4 now within the same price range.

As I'm in the market to buy a home locally, this app is very convenient. It only shows me relevant listings for my area via notifications. Would highly recommend it for anyone looking to browse property.
More pictures. Ariel veiw of property. Ariel view of neighborhood.Full ,complete pictures/photo of Every room.
Good idea but lacks a little in the filters when you're doing a search on your phone. The search results don't exactly match up when i search on my PC. It needs a way to filter out auction homes.

So far so good.. this app is truely helpful, right out of pocket helpful. They couldn't had made it anymore easy for me and my three kids to go out and find a place right on my finger tips. i am glad i have this app available to me.
When you look at a property it would be nice to go back to the listings not go out and to the map which makes you have to start over,it's a little frustrating!! It wasn't like this before.

Awesome customer support for the app. I thought you couldn't filter for pets allowed, and sent a request to customer support as a suggestion. They responded in minutes on how to do so. Anyways, very pleased with the app and support.

The mobile app sucks. Just spent the last half an hour entering information to save several searches. Can't find anything on my phone that's been saved , I can't even find a button that lets me go there, that's what my problem is.

beyond annoyed .. It cost me and my spouse $29 each to have our background checked (not a big deal) when we applied for homes, the homes we're off the market within 24 and theres no other homes in the area .. I tried contacting zillow about getting my money back, beause whats the point of spending a...Full Reviewbeyond annoyed .. It cost me and my spouse $29 each to have our background checked (not a big deal) when we applied for homes, the homes we're off the market within 24 and theres no other homes in the area .. I tried contacting zillow about getting my money back, beause whats the point of spending almost $60 to be an applicant for less then 24 Hrs. and have no other houses that work for me on the market ... they make it impossible to get a hold of.. I got NO WHERE!!
great app, but i keep getting notifications on homes that do not meet my search criteria at all. I've tried to change the settings multiple times, but no luck.

Although I find the app useful, the houses are left on the site long after they have been taken off the market. On multiple occasions, I have called the listing agent only to find out the house was sold weeks before.

wanted to look up new builds ONE time. It has forever screwed up this app for me. I have re-downloaded and went threw all of the settings and still has been unable to not show me new builds now. I have to know the exact address if I want to look at a house. very frustrating....

Good info, had to sign in twice. My 45 mins., that I'll never get back. This search produced only vacant lots, with no place to live. Dosen't help me to find my own residence. Nice pics. Site easy to navigate. Thanks for your help & info.

Have loved this app, but since newest update, screen orientation will not stay in landscape mode with my Galaxy S. updated 2/27 - Havent been able to favorite any properties for the past couple of weeks. Downloaded newest update, screen orientation and favorites still not working correctly.

ive been trying to use the app for weeks now and is telling me there are no listings anywhere but when i type in an address in and click on to it,it then shows that the house is for sale is there a solution for this i have tried uninstalling and reinstalling several times

I used to love this app and website both. the past month or so it tells me there are no homes in my area or I should check my internet connection (that I know is perfectly fine as it says this on different wifi, even data). can't do anything anymore.

The previous version had a better GUI for viewing the map, lot line, and satellite views, as well as viewing photos. New version mashes all those together. Not user friendly. Also, Android app cannot upload home photos? Only on desktop? In 2019?

Latest update forces dark theme if your phone is in dark mode. The colors are awful and it makes it impossible to use the map to find houses. This feature doesn't need to exist at all but at least allow the user to toggle it off and fix the color scheme to be usable.
I LOVED this app until recently. Now, everytime it opens, the app freezes. It is the only app on my phone doing it, so I know it is Zillow. Which sucks, because this was my favorite app to search on.
I like this app because I can find the house I want learn more about it.my cousin told me I can find a houses for sale on here.thank you so much for this app.
Great app, easy and get fast notification of new homes to market.
Great app, info I want to see is easy to access and laid out very well!
Very good app. Good filter and sorting options. Well designed.
i am looking to buy a house nice prices affordable I'm super excited like the app alot
Love it! Easy to use and constantly updating with new properties.
App used to be good now it can't find one house (rent or buy) in my entire zip code when 3 houses on my block alone have for sale signs
Would be alot better if you could filter the great school rating like redfin app
Still Not working.
overall a really good experience. my go to site/app. User interface isn't always super intuitive but once you get used to it you can get what you need to get done, done.
I have been using this app for years with no problem, but recently, it only shows one house when I search my area. It's very frustrating as I prefer Zillow over other real estate apps.
Even though I mostly love to browse, it still gives me a solid idea of what houses are in an area, the price, etc. and I love the filters. Just what I need, very intuitive. 10/10

Only thing I don't like is the Hide Property option is gone. It was a handy tool if I wasn't interested. I hate weeding through the same stuff I already know I don't want to see new properties that interest me.

search filter not working. searching for houses under $400k. but homes are not showing up that are under $400k when I "view all" with no filter. i wonder how many houses i have been missing every time i have used the price filter?!?!

Well after the new update one of my favorite features was removed, which was the option to choose an adress and select how far away the homes were from it based on time ex.30mins. It was a really usefull feature.
The search is no longer accurate. I have saved homes that do not show up when I do general searches in an area. When I use my computer the search results are different from the App.
I love browsing available homes across the country. Would love it if there were a feature that shows you homes based on homes you have "liked" or "saved". But other than that,it's great!

Best app and most frequent that I use. Has everything! THAT WAS MY REVIEW. UPDATED: I cannot seem to share anything and visa versa. As well, stuff is missing and to top it off, I cannot find ANY HELP!

Easy to use app and very helpful on several moves, but you used to be able to hide houses you didnt want to show up in your feed and you can't anymore, which makes searching through them much more tedious.
Many times when I search for "houses near me" it gives me nothing (as in zero) although most of the time I check off "for sale" on the filter. I prefer "Redfin".

After the May 3, 2019 update nothing works. I can't view previous homes, my searches come up empty. Even the home I live in mysteriously doesn't exist...do I still have to pay for it?? 😂 please fix this app, we're looking to move.
Great tool for the house hunter. Lots of options in the search tool. The market updates, status of properties, seems to have improved from years past.

The Zillow App is super easy to use. For the most part, you can find out anything about any home you want. You can check the ❤ when you want to save a home as a favorite and then you can check back on that home later. Love it!
Not always accurate, so you have to check with a realtor, but I love it all the same, very easy to use and get info from. Pics and map function are great, so are the filters.

Filters are not working. I can see the various filters to sort by but if I try to sort newest the app will only show me one, sometimes two, homes. Its very frustrating. I hope it gets fixed with the next update.
Very useful application that provides all of the information I need when I'm looking at listings. Excellent design, easy to create filters, and almost instant search response.

I've deleted and downloaded it several times and I can't save homes. It keeps saying "Favorite could not be saved. Please check your internet connection". I am connected or I would not be able to write this review!
Love the total package description when it comes to the details of property. I will say however that with very little pictures in some of them it seems like their is something to hide!

I enjoy this app very much. The only thing I would like to see is enhanced search capability as I have difficulty knowing which keywords to add to get what I want. For example, single story 4 gated community for otherwise. Would love to see tuggle boxes instead

BEST home-finder on the market!! HIGHLY RECOMMEND!! Very User-friendly AND customizable!! We used Zillow to SELL our previous (city) home (4 years ago). We ALSO used Zillow to FIND our FOREVER (country) home with 20 acres! ❤❤ Zillow is: EZ to SORT out the type/size/price range for ANY type of home!!...Full ReviewBEST home-finder on the market!! This is a handy app to have when you're looking for a new home. I figured my way around the information fairly quick. I like to search using the map then after I search my targeted area, I "search all" to see what is gor sale nearby as well.

I love the app, but really wish there was a way to sort by what kind of pets are allowed. It's very discouraging for my search to turn up apartments that are otherwise perfect but don't allow dogs. "Pet friendly" is too broad.

If I can't sort by pet friendly this app is useless to me, and extremely frustrating. It sends me "results" every day that I can't live in because I have a dog. That seems like a pretty basic and common filter to need.

Easy to use app. Well designed and is a great tool for house shopping! It would be great if you could filter out "Adult Communities. I get excited when j see a nice place I could actually afford, and then get let down because I'm too young.

Better than the website. With the app you can select and deselect properties much quicker than the website. Plus you have the full screen view whereas 50% of the screen is covered with featured properties and ads on the web version.

Zillow is a wonderful app. It has opened so many doors for me😜. It has allowed me to travel locally and meet up with new people. Its teaching me how to work the cold market🥶🥶🥶😆, new interior design trends, the real estate game etc.

I really like the concept of the app, ease of use, and options. My biggest complaint and why I'm only giving 3 star's is because it doesn't seem to be updated enough as far homes still on the market or newly listed.

Excellent tool for finding neighborhood values of a house that I'm intrested in, good way of finding reasonable comps in value, and nice links to the County website for tax and ownership information ... only drawback is listings are not updated fast enough when they're sold. 5 stars!

I used to really enjoy the app. not so much anymore. For some reason I rarely see homes on the map anymore, though houses that meet the criteria will show up in other areas. I liked being able to see locations on the map before looking further.

App does what it's supposed to. One big flaw is that in addition to the ability to mark a property entry with a heart to save it, why not have a way to mark a property as already been seen but rejected (not interested)? As it stands I get sick of looking at the same houses over and over.

It takes getting used to....but you can find houses for sale. They are disguised as "open house". Clever. I like being able to search icons (homes for sale) right on the map! Very smart Zillow! Zeway it should be.
Outdated info sales status
Love the pics, and also extra information that give a better undertanding about the district areas.
Easy to use and always updates the changes in my search for a home!
Easy to navigate
Easy to navigate
Easy to navigate
Easy to navigate
Always looking, great app.
Everything you want out of a search. All in one place. Find exactly what you want fast and easy.
Search engine is awful only shows a map, not a list of listings. Hard to browse.
We've found so many potential houses to look at/to buy!

Mostly positive. The thing I dont like is when I put in a dollar amount to seek properties, if its not over $100,000. it says there are No Properties, change your criteria. I usually have to put in the Higher amount then do alot of sorting.
I have an Android phone. For some reason it wont show ANY houses for sale. its very frustrating since I've been using this app for several weeks and have never had a problem until today.

app lists my "owned house" as a different house. this changed recently and was not the house i set up as my house a couple years ago. share the same address but different city. tried fixing but it says my "real house" address is not a real address.... come on.... get with it...

Great app to get general overview of the community, market availability (seller vs buyer's), surrounding neighborhood, open house schedule, tax rate, all in a concise, consolidated format. Well done, thanks, Zillow!!

This is an okay app, the only issue I have with it is that there isn't a filter for 55+ only communities. Not all places list this so I will get really excited about a place only to call and find out I'm ineligible.

I don't like the new app update. It was really nice to be able to adjust the monthly mortgage rate based off of the down payment and how long the loan term was for. The estimated mortgage in the new update is misleading.
It's been a great tool that allows me to look at potential relocation properties. Additional information articles on various topics for buying or selling has also been insightful.
It is a great app. It helped me quickly search areas of interest and save any listings I wanted to remember and easily share them with my husband and family for opinions.

This is an amazing app for finding great homes. The only suggestion I have is to broaden the app out of the US and into other countries like Canada or Italy or England or something like that. I'm sure others would love it too!

almost easy as the desk top version with one exception. when you attempt to plug in adjusted down payments in the mortgage calculator, everything is blacked out by the pop up calculator, you cant see the numbers being inputed only the calculator view.
I love this app. It is very helpful. Sometimes the price and estimates are so far apart I don't really know what the value really is. I have looked and used this app. For a while. I do love it.
Generally great for looking and it helped when I was looking for a house, but the change to not having a choice about landscape/portrait ruined it for me.

in the beginning it was working fine but after a few weeks, it was not showing anything, I uninstalled the app and installed it again but still not working, way easier if you just go to Zillow through Google.

Cant get the search to work in a specific area on my android. Did same search on friends iphone and listing appeared. Uninstalled and reinstalled with same results. Allowed zillows to access all info on my phone. Very very very frustrated with your app.
Love looking for homes in the area we are interested and moving to. I can mark favorite check back on them and make a list for when we go to the area to actually look to purchase. It's a great app
Love this app. I just want to see more filters. It's hard to find a place I love, only to scroll down on the listing and see they only allow small dogs (I have 50 lb dogs).

You can't edit or delete saved searches from the app. Their help article from Dec 2018 says to go to the Updates tab, click Edit, and then select which searches to remove. There is no Edit button, and the help article is closed to comments. Cool.

stupid ass search engine. I put my search parameters and the distance I was willing to travel and it kept saying 3 results even though my filters were wide open. turnsd out you have to zoom out on the map prior to entering in your filters. I like the app. It is easily navigated and since I can save land, I can watch them. see when they go sell. My only complaint are the dozens of notifications.

Still no homes for sale on the map even after the latest update! Fix this problem please! I've uninstalled and reinstalled it from my galaxy s9 several times and it still doesn't work! Still not working properly same as last update! 5/22/19.
This app is an EXCELLENT place to find a home! It is very easy to through all the listings, as well as look up homes based on location! Really like it!

Man I love just looking at all the houses for sale and dreaming. I'm not in a position to buy a house yet but it's a big dream of mine to buy, renovate and rent houses. And this is the best and easiest app I've used!
Not very user friendly. Would be nice if a list displayed, and if instead of $xx and up, it was $XX and lower. Search results are cluttered with houses way out of my price range.

since the update it sucks, no matter what i put in it says nothing available i tried contacting them but they told me try opening up on my search, they dont understand no matter what i put in it says nothing available ,if i go on other sites they show whats available in my range.. maybe you should f...Full Reviewsince the update it sucks, no matter what i put in it says nothing available i tried contacting them but they told me try opening up on my search, they dont understand no matter what i put in it says nothing available ,if i go on other sites they show whats available in my range.. maybe you should fix this problem!

Love this app. Easy to navigate, has enough options to really narrow down to the homes you want to see. Also love the detailed info given about property, for example taxes paid and last sold. Can easily avoid quick flip or overpriced homes.
I love the app. I only have a problem with the zestimate. One house said the zestimate was 144,000 and two days later it said 124,900. That has happened a couple of times.

I love using the Zillow app to look for homes in areas I'm interested in buying a home! All you have to do is fill in what kind of home and the area you want to live in and they'll show you every home they have listed! You'll love this app too!

I have used Zillow since 2016 (apartment hunting) and again since 2018 till present in my search for my 'everafter' home in a rural community. Zillow has improved 100 fold since then and continues to outshine the rest of them. Keep up the good work!

This is a wonderful app for house hunters or people looking to rent. It's easy to use and has all the extra information that users will find helpful, such as estimated price of the property, trend, and the ability to save favorite ones.

Too many emails and no way to turn them off in app settings. Creates an email mailing list every time you save a search or select a favorite. You can unsubscribe but you get re-enlisted after each new saved list or favorite.
The app works, but the data is out-of-date. Homes listed on Zillow are already under contract or even sold in the MLS. Using Zillow was a waste of our time.
Great app for looking at the local real estate market. Actually does a good job of recommending houses to me, and will let me know when a saved house comes on the market!

This app is worse than the website so I don't know why they would push customers here. You can't choose 1.5+ bathrooms, you can't view a "list" of home but only the map. It seems like very basic functionality that they have decided to remove.
I review this almost weekly to look at certain geographic regions of the US. I am impressed with its quick switch to various listings and photos. I especially like and use its Google map references.

constantly have to restart my phone to get the app to fully restart and actually show more than 2 houses for sale. and don't even bother trying to see open houses. this app used to be good. now it's a joke.
Doesn't work after update. Many other reviewers have said that since the update it doesn't list houses for sale anymore and the only response is "email us". Can you all fix it? Used to be a great app

It's ok. But I'd prefer the former app because it let's me find the distance between areas. This updated version will not let me go back to houses I'm looking at within my email without completely going back to my home screen.

I dont know what happened to this app. It used to be fantastic for looking at what could be my next home but now anytime i try to use it, my phone locks up and needs to be restarted. When that issue is fixed, or if it is, i will amend this comment.

Has features like lot lines that are better than other apps, wish it had more detailed filters like multi-family (4-plex, duplex) and style (ranch, tri-level) but with the draw feature, you can really narrow down neighborhoods and get instant updates.

Zillow was pretty decent until a glitch caused anything for sale to not load. Support had me un/reinstall the app. My original account disappeared along with all my saves/likes. Not starting over again so uninstalled. Was a solid 3, maybe 4 prior to this.

I like the descriptions of everything you use I like the way that you show the taxes an the property had been sold it gives you an idea of how the property increases I'm happy with Zillow I I'm looking for lake property and just one thing I wished you put a report on you're homes about the Lakes wha...Full ReviewI like the descriptions of everything you use I like the way that you show the taxes an the property had been sold it gives you an idea of how the property increases I'm happy with Zillow I I'm looking for lake property and just one thing I wished you put a report on you're homes about the Lakes what quality the water is and about toxic algae to me is an important fact when you're buying property that's something that people don't think about if you did that you'd be the only one doing it

I appreciate the data given by this app that similar apps do not. I would like to see them add additional filters for buyers like pending/not pending listings so i am not nothering my broker about listings that are no longer available. This is the only reason I use Redfin first.

Helpful app The only thing that frustrates me is that when I get a notification of a property (s) for sale, the property is not in my area of choice. I've tried several times to change the area but it never takes.

Can't even sign in. It makes me use Google log in but it's not a Gmail account and is trying to make me set up a whole to Gmail account just to log in?? Can't use the Facebook log in because its not linked to my existing Zillow account and tries to create a whole new Zillow account..

It's good if I could get that one house to myself with no Mom in it. If I can get this house for Mom that she is in then it's as perfect as 5 stars rating. Easy to navigate
Thoroughly enjoy the options and build of the app. Very easy to use.
Easy to navigate
Not bad, but appears to only offer a map view and not a list.

I HATE how when u ask a specific question about a rental property thru the app it doesn't send the question to get answered to the realtor or property manager so I can get a direct reply! So if someone adds a message to a property I feel it should b answered since there is a question section. Its annoying.
I love looking at home prices wherever I am at any giving time. Lots O fun!

Like the app, lets me move around the state to look at areas I am interested in for homes to purchase. I use the MLS numbers in the listings to let my realator know the properties I want to see when I'm in the area!!
need to be able to filter out auction property. when you search listings 95% of them are for auctions. there is no way that I have found to remove auction properties from the list.
I would have given 5 stars if I didn't keep getting notifications for "recommendations" that do not match my saved searches. Other then that, app is great.
The app is similar but not identical to the website. I suggest the best features of each, be cross-adopted and the "suppress" feature for properties already seen and not of interest, be reinstated.
I'm addicted to the Zillow app! As a real estate photographer, and a lover of design and architecture, it is the best way to keep up with the properties I have filmed, as well as the overall market.
super helpful home buying (and selling) resource. I just sold my house and also found my new house on Zillow. great for understanding the market. love the photos and description categories.
I hate it that when you do a search it shows the map and not the home listings in pictures as default and there is no way to put it back to the home pixtures. Its not user friendly! 😖

love the pictures of the houses and street view. Give me a chance to see more of the places also I can show my wife and our family and friends. We save the one's we like and to pick a few so we can go veiw them to see the areas and etc. thanks Doug 👍
Works great. My only issue is that there seems to be some disconnect in regards to what properties show up between my 2 devices, even when the same filters are checked.
Mostly great when it works but can be glitchy. Problems with property info being missing, especially on condos - no HOA data included here even though it's available on other sites like Redfin.

The apps okay. It just doesn't have a setting that alerts me for homes the areas I am interested in. Also when I go on another home app, there are a lot more homes available in certain areas that Zillow doesn't have.

The app is good. But it would be great if it wasn't for all the notifications about new locations, and then it turns out to be a "New Construction". Its annoying and I slid I wanted to see those I would go to those types of websites.

what happened to the "drive time" option? its what i was using to figure out the commute to and from work for a potential new home. now i have to google search it. im switching to a different house finding ap simply because of this not being an option anymore.
great! Updated review 9/22/19. Don't like the night/dark mode since update a few days ago. I'm agrivated that I can't find a way to turn it off. Lost the 5th star for that.
I used to rely on this app. However, recent updates have made it unusable. I get stuck in a loop of confirming that I am not a robot... never getting to the actual property listings.

A great way to see homes in the location i'm interested in and organize the ones that interest me. Its filters work well. My only issue is that needed information is lacking on some of the properties.
Hard to use on cell phone, other stuff takes up a lot of screen space. Difficult to put in search criteria. But it's "free" so can't complain too much!
Landscape mode for tablets is not fully supported. Map and pictures of houses can be in landscape, but the description is not. This needs to be fixed!
I love this app. I like the mortgage calculator. I like the fact you can play around with the downpayment to be able to see around the monthly amount you would need and pay.

author_name: Trauge W. May II PoorBoy Racing and Fabrication Co.
review_body: I love it, but it needs to be improved by a "on the moment" updating on house's on the market and pending. Overall only site I use to find my next house!!

won't save my search preferences. no place in the search filter to click pets ok. type in the, "keyword" section of the advanced search, "pets ok" and it still gives me homes that say, "pets: NO". garbage app
I like the app a lot. Only thing I'd like to see is "price per square foot" added to the sort function. Thank you, it's been a tremendous help in searching for a home!

I really wish Zillow had a filtering option where you can search for a rental home by date availability. Such as a home that's available starting on a later date or after. It would really help out....

well unfortunately like many many other in realtors game, ur site doesnt have any rentals , locally, n the ones that r dog friendly n under $650.00 a month. I don't know what is going on with this app, but there has been so few properties showing up that it's not worth using anymore. Using same parameters on other apps get more results.
